title: Unable to login to dashboard
description: Customer reports 'Invalid credentials' error despite correct password. Happens on Chrome and Firefox.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup
description: iOS app crashes immediately after splash screen on iPhone 12, iOS 17.0.

title: Invoice PDF not downloadable
description: Download button returns 500 error when attempting to fetch invoice PDF #INV-4521.

title: Password reset email delayed
description: Password reset email takes over 30 minutes to arrive; sometimes not delivered.

title: Search returns incomplete results
description: Searching for 'order 2025' misses recent orders placed in September.

title: UI overlap on small screens
description: Footer links overlap with social icons on screens smaller than 360px width.

title: API rate limit too strict
description: Automated integrations hitting 429 too often; customers request higher burst limit.

title: Email templates broken for Spanish locale
description: Placeholders not replaced in es-ES templates; users see {{firstName}} instead of name.

title: Slow page load on order history
description: Order history page takes ~12s to load for customers with >500 orders.

title: Wrong tax calculation for EU orders
description: VAT calculated incorrectly for some EU countries when shipping address differs from billing.

title: Two-factor auth codes not accepted
description: 2FA codes generated by app sometimes rejected with 'code expired' immediately.

title: Feature request: export CSV with custom fields
description: Customer requests ability to include custom metadata fields when exporting tickets to CSV.
